item.description:
The group has begun to grow, and there seem to be a few "regulars". People of all skill levels come to share ideas, patterns, new resourcess and yarn.

I'd like to hear from those who would like to meet more than once a month, and which night (I can't meet Thursday nights) would work for the most folks.

Come join us, to share, knit together, and for conversation,

Shirley :-)
item.how_to_find_us: It will be meeting on the second TUESDAY OF EACH MONTH, ON-G0ING, at the Starbucks, at 1005 Main Street, Newington. I'll have a "Meet-up" sign at the table, and will be knitting.
item.name: The Newington Knitting April Meetup
